programme.title: Am B.F.G./The BFG

programme.title: Lios Mhairi/Mairi's Hebridean Garden

programme.title: Everest: An Slighe Mhairbhteach

programme.title: Belladrum

programme.title: The UnXplained With...
programme.desc: Devastating Disasters: Today, we tend to think that our scientific knowledge can help protect us from almost anything, including natural disasters. But is that really true? (S3, ep 28)

programme.title: Weird Or What?...
programme.desc: Medical Mysteries: Medics at a hospital fall gravely ill after treating a mysteriously ailing patient in a circumstance that can't be explained by science. Or can it? (S3, ep 9)

programme.title: Weird Or What?...
programme.desc: Mysterious Vanishings: Baffling stories of people who vanished without a trace, including a young Tasmanian pilot who is chased by unidentified aircraft before disappearing. (S3, ep 8)

programme.title: Close Encounters
programme.desc: A hitchhiker is terrified when lights appear to attack him. A sighting in France becomes one of the most investigated cases in UFO history. (S2, ep 12)

programme.title: Close Encounters
programme.desc: A couple spot a huge blimp-shaped craft hovering over Michigan's Lake Erie in 1988. In 1963, two sisters and their housekeeper report being knocked down by a UFO emitting flames. (S2, ep 1)

programme.title: Paranormal: Caught On Camera
programme.desc: A Demonic Doll Terrorizes A Family & More: A Pennsylvania family is terrorised by a haunted doll and two friends witness a fleet of UFOs in the night sky. (S1, ep 16)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: To Catch A Thief - Part 2: The Golds set up an elaborate sting to catch the thief that's in their midst. Who is it? And do they have enough evidence to involve the police? (S8, ep 13)

programme.title: Auction Kings
programme.desc: Wild West Memorabilia/ NFL Helmet: The Gallery 63 crew take in a football helmet autographed by multiple quarterback legends and an 1868 stamp supposedly worth millions. (S3, ep 22)

programme.title: Auction Kings
programme.desc: Redneck Chariot/Japanese Antique Daggers: The Gallery 63 crew auction off a pair of 1800s Japanese daggers, an Art Nouveau cash register, and a redneck chariot. (S3, ep 23)

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: The Disclosure Event: In 2021, the US government broke a 70-year precedent of denying UFOs and released a groundbreaking report on Unidentified Aerial Phenomena. This is the full story.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Mystery of the Standing Stones: According to Ancient Astronaut Theorists, the placement of monoliths and their geological makeup could point to extraterrestrial intervention. (S14, ep 2)

programme.title: Dickinson's Real Deal
programme.desc: Join antiques expert and presenter David Dickinson as more collectors try to sell their items to dealers. Will they strike a deal or take a chance at auction instead? (S9, ep 81)

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: The Pawn Strikes Back: Rick gets a shot at an original Eastman Kodak camera, while Corey has a sweet tooth for an unopened box of 1980s Star Wars candy.

programme.title: Auction Hunters
programme.desc: Trading Places: When an injury sidelines Allen at the shop, Ton goes rogue at auction, ignoring his partner's advice and making risky purchases. (S4, ep 6)

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Let My Lockers Go: Kenny tries to honour the history of San Bernardino, recording a win along the way. Also, Brandi shows her literary prowess volume by volume. (S13, ep 11)

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Series following part-gamblers, part-antique experts who bid for the contents of abandoned storage units. When the doors open, will it be treasure or trash? (S13, ep 12)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Busted: With their father/son relationship already on the rocks, a major miscommunication between Les and Seth threatens to land a key employee on the chopping block. (S9, ep 6)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Watch Your Back: When Les allows a $60,000 watch to walk out the door on a handshake agreement, Seth and Ashley flip out. (S9, ep 7)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: American Jewellery & Zoo: Les makes a deal to get the kids off his back, but when some interesting animals come through the door, it might be too much for him to resist. (S9, ep 8)

programme.title: Conspiracy Files Unsealed
programme.desc: Doomsday: On 8 April 2011, the FBI declassified decades of top secret government documents for the first time. Here, experts examine the possibility of the end of the world. (S1, ep 1)

programme.title: Conspiracy Files Unsealed
programme.desc: Cloning: Animal cloning has been a reality for decades but the disturbing truth is that human cloning may be much closer than you think. (S1, ep 7)

programme.title: Conspiracy Files Unsealed
programme.desc: Bigfoot: Is this half-man, half-ape simply a figment of our collective imagination or does he really exist? Experts ask whether he is being hidden from us and why. (S1, ep 8)

programme.title: Conspiracy Files Unsealed
programme.desc: Rise Of The Machines: We rely on machines for virtually every aspect of modern life. But is technology going too far, too fast? And will humans suffer the consequences? (S1, ep 10)

programme.title: Conspiracy Files Unsealed
programme.desc: Stargate Portals: Discover the locations of stargate portals around the world. Thought to be doorways to wormholes in time, who is battling to open them and why? (S1, ep 11)

programme.title: Conspiracy Files Unsealed
programme.desc: Remote Viewing: A look at the CIA's rumoured investment in psychological operations. Could there be an army of remote viewers watching American citizens today? (S1, ep 13)

programme.title: Conspiracy Files Unsealed
programme.desc: Time Travel: Could the ability to travel through time be real? Experts unseal new evidence suggesting this phenomenon of science fiction might not be as far-fetched as it seems. (S1, ep 16)

programme.title: Conspiracy Files Unsealed
programme.desc: Secret Government Warehouses: From Fort Knox to Hanger 18 and Camp Hero, discover the shocking truth hidden inside the government's secret and highly-fortified areas. (S1, ep 20)

programme.title: Conspiracy Files Unsealed
programme.desc: Global Depopulation: Many predict a cataclysmic event will soon spell the end of the human race. If disaster struck, is there a way we could save ourselves from extinction? (S1, ep 21)

programme.title: Conspiracy Files Unsealed
programme.desc: America's Flying Saucer: From flying saucers to killer drones, discover the out-of-this-world technology the US military is using to conquer the globe. (S1, ep 22)

programme.title: Strange Evidence
programme.desc: Freak of the Deep: Deep-sea explorers discover a monster thousands of feet deep in the ocean, killer fog threatens a US town, and a truck spontaneously explodes on a freeway. (S2, ep 1)

programme.title: Strange Evidence
programme.desc: Curse of the Mayan Treasure: An explorer at a Mayan sacrificial site is attacked by an underwater fog, thousands of fish jump to their deaths, and a UFO is spotted in LA skies. (S2, ep 3)

programme.title: Strange Evidence

programme.title: Yakka Dee!
programme.desc: z. Dee encourages a friend to say 'z', and we go on an adventure around the sound. We see some zips, do some zooming and see some zebras crossing a road!

programme.title: Numberblocks
programme.desc: Five's Handy Shop. Five opens a handy new shop and helps her friends learn the value of money and how to combine lots of pennies into bigger ones.

programme.title: Alphablocks
programme.desc: Champ. Educational fun. CH and SH go head to head in the Alphablocks Games and pit a ship and a shop against a chip and a chop.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: Spot the Difference. Duggee looks different, but what is it? By playing some looking games, the Squirrels learn how best to spot the difference.

programme.title: Love Monster
programme.desc: What's Going on Day. Love Monster doesn't know what day they are celebrating in Fluffytown today.

programme.title: Yukee
programme.desc: Snowbells. It's been snowing in the garden, and Yukee helps Sonny find uses for a large collection of recycled bells.

programme.title: Colourblocks
programme.desc: Red. An excitable Red arrives in Colourland. Learn about the colour red.

programme.title: Something Special: We're All Friends

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: Tiddlytubby Party. Preschool series. Tinky Winky finds a party invitation and shows it to Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po. The invitation takes flight, and they follow it to find a party.

programme.title: Vida the Vet
programme.desc: Sweetwood's Sneezy Day. Vida's patients aren't sick, but they can't stop sneezing! Can she figure out why?

programme.title: Mojo Swoptops

programme.title: Roots and Fruits
programme.desc: Parsley. Live from the Roots and Fruits theatre, it's Parsley performing Rise Up with Me.

programme.title: Waffle the Wonder Dog
programme.desc: PE Waffle. Evie forgets her reading book, so Waffle takes it to her at school. As Waffle reaches the playground, he sees Evie's PE class and is desperate to join in.

programme.title: Grace's Amazing Machines
programme.desc: Helpful Machines. CBeebies' Grace shows off three amazing machines that can help other machines!

programme.title: Aneeshwar and Lizzie Go Wild

programme.title: The Game Catchers
programme.desc: Snap on Snapball. Beep-bop-bop. The Game Catchers arrive on a pinball planet where they get to play it moves!

programme.title: Big Lizard
programme.desc: Astronaut Health Check. Dad needs some training to pass his astronaut fitness test.

programme.title: Hey Duggee

programme.title: Peter Rabbit

programme.title: Andy's Prehistoric Adventures
programme.desc: Australopithecus and Hair. Preschool adventure series. Andy heads back three million years in time, where he runs into some ancient primates and joins their tribe.

programme.title: Go Jetters
programme.desc: The Parthenon, Greece. Animated adventure comedy series. The Grimbots are flying the Vroomster and their dodgy manoeuvres are about to flatten the Parthenon - Go Jetters, go!

programme.title: Bluey

programme.desc: From the economy to the climate and the EU's role in world affairs, this talk show sheds light on European affairs and the issues that impact on our daily lives as Europeans.

programme.title: Brussels, My Love?
programme.desc: From the economy to the climate and the EU's role in world affairs, this talk show sheds light on European affairs and the issues that impact on our daily lives as Europeans.

programme.title: Inglourious Basterds
programme.desc: (2009) Quentin Tarantino's WWII action-adventure with Brad Pitt. A squad of Jewish American soldiers go Nazi-hunting in occupied France. With Christoph Waltz and Michael Fassbender.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Hollywood
programme.desc: (2019) Quentin Tarantino's darkly comic drama set in 60s LA, starring Leonardo DiCaprio, Brad Pitt and Margot Robbie. A failing actor's world collides with the Manson Family.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Daleks Invasion Earth 2150 A.D.
programme.desc: (1966) A sci-fi classic with Peter Cushing. Dr Who travels to the future only to find the Daleks have conquered the Earth! Can he stop them nuking the planet's core? With Bernard Cribbins.

programme.title: Local Hero
programme.desc: (1983) Comedy starring Peter Riegert, Burt Lancaster and Peter Capaldi. A US oil company executive tries to persuade a small Scottish seaside community to sell up their entire village.

programme.title: The Greatest Showman
programme.desc: (2017) Hugh Jackman, Zac Efron and Michelle Williams star in the Golden-Globe-winning, toe-tapping smash hit musical about the life and times of P.T. Barnum, the creator of the circus.

programme.title: Clueless
programme.desc: (1995) Classic 90s high-school re-imagining of Jane Austen's Emma. Two fashion-obsessed pals (Alicia Silverstone, Stacey Dash) transform a new girl (Brittany Murphy) but create a monster.

programme.title: Cowboys & Aliens
programme.desc: (2011) Sci-fi western starring Daniel Craig and Harrison Ford. A brutal cattle baron and his amnesiac enemy must cease their feuding when a town is attacked by aliens.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Ghost...
programme.desc: ...Protocol: (2011) Part four of the Tom Cruise action-thriller franchise. The Impossible Missions Force fight to clear their name, while also trying to avert nuclear war. Busy, busy, busy!

programme.title: Everybody's Talking About Jamie
programme.desc: (2021) Feelgood coming-of-age musical with Max Harwood, Sarah Lancashire and Richard E Grant. A young lad dreams of escaping his humdrum existence and becoming a fabulous drag queen.

programme.title: Sick of Myself
programme.desc: (2022) Social satire meets body horror. A barista deliberately overdoses on a banned drug in her attempts to become famous and overshadow her artist boyfriend. In Norwegian/subs.

programme.title: Bringing in the Bells
programme.desc: Lorraine Kelly is joined by Susie McCabe, Grado, Jean Johansson, Gordon Smart, Sean Batty and Laura Boyd to reflect on 2024 as they ring in the new year and look forward to 2025

programme.title: TikTok: Top 100 2024
programme.desc: A countdown of the top 100 funniest, most extreme and rudest viral videos of 2024 from TikTok and other social media platforms. Plus, an estimation of how much money the clips made for their creators

programme.title: You Bet!
programme.desc: Holly Willoughby and Stephen Mulhern host the second of two editions of a reboot of the game show, which sees contestants face extraordinary challenges for the chance to win £10,000. A panel of celebrities, led by Rob Beckett and featuring Olly Murs, Mary Earps and Judi Love, and the studio audience must predict if each challenger can complete the task with which they are faced

programme.title: Archie
programme.desc: As a young man in his twenties, Archie Leach is struggling to make his way in New York when a chance encounter with comedian George Burns leads him to audition for a play. After receiving rave reviews for his performance, he travels to Hollywood, where his good looks quickly get him attention. He signs a deal with Paramount Studios, is given the new name Cary Grant and is spotted by screen icon Mae West. Drama, starring Jason Isaacs

programme.title: Unwind with STV
programme.desc: Daily escape designed to calm the mind and encourage relaxation and reflection

programme.title: Unwind with STV
programme.desc: Daily escape designed to calm the mind and encourage relaxation and reflection

programme.title: In for a Penny
programme.desc: Stephen Mulhern takes the show across the pond for a special long episode from Walt Disney World Resort in Florida with classic games and brand-new ones too.

programme.title: Pictionary
programme.desc: Mel Giedroyc hosts the game show where two teams of three players compete against each other trying to guess the correct word or phrase represented by the drawings of their team-mates. Mel is joined by Jeff Brazier and Scarlett Moffatt as the players draw and their team members guess

programme.title: The Chase: The Bloopers 2024
programme.desc: Bradley Walsh presents a compilation of mistakes, outtakes and laughs from the quiz show, featuring regular Chasers Shaun Wallace, Mark Labbett, Jenny Ryan, Anne Hegerty, Paul Sinha and Darragh Ennis

programme.title: Chitty Chitty Bang Bang
programme.desc: Musical fantasy starring Dick Van Dyke. An inventor restores a clapped-out racing car with the help of his eccentric father and two children. They christen it Chitty Chitty Bang Bang and, much to their surprise, the vehicle turns out to have magical powers.

programme.title: Despicable Me 3
programme.desc: Animated comedy adventure featuring the voices of Steve Carell, Kristen Wiig and Trey Parker. Having already acquired a wife and three orphan daughters, reformed supervillain Gru now discovers that he has a long-lost twin, Dru. But Dru is hoping he can convince his brother to return to his wicked ways...

programme.title: ITV Lunchtime News
programme.desc: The key headlines from the day so far

programme.title: STV Racing: Live from Cheltenham
programme.desc: Ed Chamberlin presents coverage of a meeting headlined by the Relkeel Hurdle from Cheltenham, plus action from Musselburgh. With analysis from AP McCoy and Mick Fitzgerald, and commentary by Richard Hoiles

programme.title: Jurassic World
programme.desc: Decades on from the creation of Jurassic Park, a fully operational attraction filled with genetically engineered dinosaurs has been opened on the island. In need of a new attraction, the company behind the park creates an entirely new species - only for it to escape and terrorise the tourists. Action adventure sequel, starring Chris Pratt and Bryce Dallas Howard

programme.title: Tipping Point: Best Ever Finals
programme.desc: More of the most dramatic endgames from the arcade-themed quiz show hosted by Ben Shephard, as plucky players and famous faces alike take on the machine for its £10,000 jackpot

programme.title: ITV Evening News
programme.desc: A round-up of the day's news headlines and talking points from the UK and around the world

programme.title: Emmerdale
programme.desc: Cain and Moira book a quiet lunch, Jacob apologises to Sarah, and it is the anniversary of Heath's death as Bob breaks down

programme.title: Coronation Street
programme.desc: Roy makes a timely decision to check on an unwell Carla, Sarah spots an emotional exchange between Daniel and Daisy, and Evelyn applies to university. Cassie delights in winding up Tracy, Lisa confronts Matty over Becky's death, and Dylan calls a truce with Mason

programme.title: Vera
programme.desc: As she considers a life-changing decision, Vera finds herself investigating two cases when an ex-prisoner's body is discovered on the banks of the River Tyne and she has to find out if the former inmate has been served cold justice or if there's more to his death

programme.title: ITV News
programme.desc: A fresh perspective on the major stories of the day, featuring national and international news, with reports and analysis from ITV's correspondents

programme.title: Ghost
programme.desc: Romantic drama starring Patrick Swayze, Demi Moore and Whoopi Goldberg. Soon after swearing his undying love to girlfriend Molly Jensen, investment banker Sam Wheat is killed by a mugger. Sam's troubled spirit refuses to leave Molly and he becomes her ghostly guardian, but how can he warn her that her life is in danger?

programme.title: My National Gallery
programme.desc: The stories of people whose lives have been touched by the art museum in Trafalgar Square, from security guards to directors, and everyday visitors to celebrities and members of the royal family. Claudia Winkleman, Michael Palin, Terry Gilliam, Jacqueline Wilson and Princess Eugenie are among those revealing personal connections with the National Gallery, with each contributor identifying the one artwork that means the most to them, with this diverse cross-section of society making surprising choices of both well-known masterpieces and hidden gems

programme.desc: A profile of the comedy writer and performer, taking an upbeat and honest look back at the life and work of the trailblazer behind Dame Edna Everage and Sir Les Patterson. programme.title: Coronation Street
programme.desc: Mason takes a risk to help Lisa to apprehend his brothers, Evelyn encounters a familiar face at her university interview, and Daisy decides to cut ties with Bertie. Tracy accuses Cassie of swindling Ken, and Carla learns that her kidney has been damaged by sepsis

programme.title: Vera, Farewell Pet
programme.desc: Documentary going behind the scenes to examine the appeal of ITV detective drama Vera as it comes to an end after 13 years. Brenda Blethyn reflects on her time as DCI Vera Stanhope, and talks about the camaraderie and joy of working on the show. Featuring interviews from key cast members - David Leon (DS Joe Ashworth), Jon Morrison (DC Kenny Lockhart), the directors, crew, and author Ann Cleeves, Vera's creator

programme.title: ITV News at Ten
programme.desc: A fresh perspective on the major stories of the day, featuring national and international news, with reports and analysis from ITV's correspondents

programme.title: Road to Perdition
programme.desc: Period crime drama starring Tom Hanks and Paul Newman. The Midwest in the 1930s: when the profession of ruthless hitman Michael Sullivan is discovered, a killer is sent to eradicate him and his family. But Sullivan and his 12-year-old son escape and embark upon a life-changing journey of revenge.

programme.title: Spectre
programme.desc: Spy adventure starring Daniel Craig and Christoph Waltz. After foiling a terrorist attack in Mexico City, James Bond picks up the trail of a secret organisation known as Spectre. He infiltrates one of their meetings in Rome, only to discover that his every move has been monitored by Spectre's mysterious leader, a man known as Franz Oberhauser.

programme.title: Bringing in the Bells
programme.desc: Lorraine Kelly is joined by Susie McCabe, Grado, Jean Johansson, Gordon Smart, Sean Batty and Laura Boyd to reflect on 2024 as they ring in the new year and look forward to 2025

programme.title: TikTok: Top 100 2024
programme.desc: A countdown of the top 100 funniest, most extreme and rudest viral videos of 2024 from TikTok and other social media platforms. Plus, an estimation of how much money the clips made for their creators

programme.title: You Bet!
programme.desc: Holly Willoughby and Stephen Mulhern host the second of two editions of a reboot of the game show, which sees contestants face extraordinary challenges for the chance to win £10,000. A panel of celebrities, led by Rob Beckett and featuring Olly Murs, Mary Earps and Judi Love, and the studio audience must predict if each challenger can complete the task with which they are faced

programme.title: Archie
programme.desc: As a young man in his twenties, Archie Leach is struggling to make his way in New York when a chance encounter with comedian George Burns leads him to audition for a play. After receiving rave reviews for his performance, he travels to Hollywood, where his good looks quickly get him attention. He signs a deal with Paramount Studios, is given the new name Cary Grant and is spotted by screen icon Mae West. Drama, starring Jason Isaacs

programme.desc: Daily escape designed to calm the mind and encourage relaxation and reflection

programme.title: Chitty Chitty Bang Bang

programme.title: Despicable Me 3
programme.desc: Animated comedy adventure featuring the voices of Steve Carell, Kristen Wiig and Trey Parker. But Dru is hoping he can convince his brother to return to his wicked ways...

programme.title: Jurassic World
programme.desc: Decades on from the creation of Jurassic Park, a fully operational attraction filled with genetically engineered dinosaurs has been opened on the island. Action adventure sequel, starring Chris Pratt and Bryce Dallas Howard

programme.desc: Roy makes a timely decision to check on an unwell Carla, Sarah spots an emotional exchange between Daniel and Daisy, and Evelyn applies to university. Cassie delights in winding up Tracy, Lisa confronts Matty over Becky's death, and Dylan calls a truce with Mason

programme.title: Vera

programme.title: ITV News
programme.desc: A fresh perspective on the major stories of the day, featuring national and international news, with reports and analysis from ITV's correspondents

programme.title: Ghost
programme.desc: Romantic drama starring Patrick Swayze, Demi Moore and Whoopi Goldberg. Soon after swearing his undying love to girlfriend Molly Jensen, investment banker Sam Wheat is killed by a mugger. Sam's troubled spirit refuses to leave Molly and he becomes her ghostly guardian, but how can he warn her that her life is in danger?

programme.title: My National Gallery
programme.desc: The stories of people whose lives have been touched by the art museum in Trafalgar Square, from security guards to directors, and everyday visitors to celebrities and members of the royal family. Claudia Winkleman, Michael Palin, Terry Gilliam, Jacqueline Wilson and Princess Eugenie are among those revealing personal connections with the National Gallery, with each contributor identifying the one artwork that means the most to them, with this diverse cross-section of society making surprising choices of both well-known masterpieces and hidden gems

programme.desc: Mel Giedroyc hosts the game show where two teams of three players compete against each other trying to guess the correct word or phrase represented by the drawings of their team-mates. Mel is joined by Jeff Brazier and Scarlett Moffatt as the players draw and their team members guess

programme.title: The Chase: The Bloopers 2024

programme.title: Chitty Chitty Bang Bang
programme.desc: Musical fantasy starring Dick Van Dyke. An inventor restores a clapped-out racing car with the help of his eccentric father and two children. They christen it Chitty Chitty Bang Bang and, much to their surprise, the vehicle turns out to have magical powers.

programme.title: Despicable Me 3
programme.desc: Animated comedy adventure featuring the voices of Steve Carell, Kristen Wiig and Trey Parker. Having already acquired a wife and three orphan daughters, reformed supervillain Gru now discovers that he has a long-lost twin, Dru. But Dru is hoping he can convince his brother to return to his wicked ways...

programme.title: Jurassic World
programme.desc: Decades on from the creation of Jurassic Park, a fully operational attraction filled with genetically engineered dinosaurs has been opened on the island. In need of a new attraction, the company behind the park creates an entirely new species - only for it to escape and terrorise the tourists. Action adventure sequel, starring Chris Pratt and Bryce Dallas Howard

programme.title: Vera

programme.title: Ghost
programme.desc: Romantic drama starring Patrick Swayze, Demi Moore and Whoopi Goldberg. Soon after swearing his undying love to girlfriend Molly Jensen, investment banker Sam Wheat is killed by a mugger. Sam's troubled spirit refuses to leave Molly and he becomes her ghostly guardian, but how can he warn her that her life is in danger?

programme.title: My National Gallery
programme.desc: The stories of people whose lives have been touched by the art museum in Trafalgar Square, from security guards to directors, and everyday visitors to celebrities and members of the royal family. Claudia Winkleman, Michael Palin, Terry Gilliam, Jacqueline Wilson and Princess Eugenie are among those revealing personal connections with the National Gallery, with each contributor identifying the one artwork that means the most to them, with this diverse cross-section of society making surprising choices of both well-known masterpieces and hidden gems
